pages.title: 404 Not Found
pages.text: 404 Not Found **很抱歉，您访问的页面不存在** 可能是输入地址有误或该地址已被删除

pages.title: 我的朋友们
pages.text: 各位大佬想交换友链的话可以在下方留言，必须要有名称、头像链接、和至少一个标签哦～ 名称： Tobuv’s blog头像： assets/person.png网址： https://tobuv.github.io标签： xxx

posts.title: article-1
posts.text: 算法学习@[toc] 排序综合直接插入排序123456789101112/*插入排序*/void insert_sort(int arr[], int length){ int i, j; for (i = 1; i < length; i++) { int tem = arr[i]; for (j = i; j > 0 && arr[j - 1] > tem; j--) arr[j] = arr[j - 1]; arr[j] = tem; }} 希尔排序（插入排序改进）123456789101112131415/*希尔排序（插入排序升级）*/void shell_sort(int arr[],int length){ int i, j, k; for (k = length / 2; k > 0; k /= 2) { for (i = k; i < length; i++) { int tem = arr[i]; for (j = i; j > 0 && arr[j - k] > tem; j -= k) arr[j] = arr[j - k]; arr[j] = tem; } }} 冒泡排序1234567891011121314151617/*冒泡排序*/void bubble_sort(int arr[], int length){ int i, j; for (i = 0; i < length - 1; i++) { for (j = 0; j < length - 1 - i; j++) { if (arr[j] > arr[j + 1]) { int tem = arr[j + 1]; arr[j + 1] = arr[j]; arr[j] = tem; } } }} 快速排序（冒泡排序升级）123456789101112131415161718192021void quick_sort(int arr[],int left,int right){ if (left >= right) return; int i, j, k; i = left; j = right; k = arr[left]; while (i < j) { while (i < j && arr[j] >= k) j--; arr[i] = arr[j]; while (i < j && arr[i] <= k) i++; arr[j] = arr[i]; } arr[i] = k; quick_sort(arr, left, i - 1); quick_sort(arr, i+1, right);} 归并排序1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041void mergearray(int arr[], int left, int mid, int right, int temp[])//合并数组{ int i, j, k; i = left; j = mid+1; k = 0; while (i <= mid && j <= right)//mid左右数组a[i]~a[mid],a[j]~a[right]都未遍历完 if (arr[i] < arr[j]) temp[k++] = arr[i++]; else temp[k++] = arr[j++]; while (i <= mid) //a[j]~a[right]已遍历完 { temp[k++] = arr[i++]; } while (j <= right) //a[i]~a[mid]已遍历完 { temp[k++] = arr[j++]; } for (int i = 0; i < k; i++) //temp数组传给原数组 arr[left+i] = temp[i];}void mergesort(int arr[], int left, int right,int temp[]){ if (left < right) { int mid = (left + right) / 2; mergesort(arr, left, mid, temp); mergesort(arr, mid + 1, right, temp); mergearray(arr, left, mid, right, temp); }}bool merge_sort(int arr[],int n){ int* p = (int*)malloc(n * sizeof(int)); if (!p) return false; mergesort(arr, 0, n - 1, p); free(p); return true;}

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
